name: Gau
subtitle: Barbarian of Frozen Lands
description: A barbarian that rules the snowy plains of the frozen land, he undermines the morale of enemies with ear-deafening shouts and charges into them like a storm.
story: Gau is a powerful warrior from the Barbarian Kingdom. Whenever he swung his twin axes, a bloodbath would follow. As a warrior, he was feared for his peerless ferocity. However, he suddenly disappeared for 10 years. When he returned, he was a completely changed man. His violent Barbarian tendencies were all gone, even when others criticized him. Instead, he now faces them with smiles and jolly laughter. The kind, warm gaze he now shows to children and animals is especially surprising.

inn.idle: You have some business with a barbarian?

recruit.greet: Nice to meet you. Let's go hunting together sometime.
talk: I look strong? Eh, stop making me blush.
All those beauties around you, don't make me jealous, buddy!

affinity.greet: It's kind of embarrassing to be doing this.
talk: Have you seen Yanne lately? I wonder how she's doing...
What? How I know Lewisia? That kid... Even though she's older... It's not like it'll work out just because I like her...
affinity.gift: Thank you. I'll treat you next time.

relationship.greet: Ha! We meet again! Doing well?
talk: Ah...that little Lei became such a fine lady...and to think that her real age was...hahaha!
I'll shatter you to pieces! - Well, how was that? The kids laugh when I act like that.
Hahaha, me and some old dwarf drank a lot last time. Actually, we drank all the alcohol at the Inn! Hahahaha!!

uw.story: It is said that there lives a sacred beast protecting the Barbarians in the Windland Snow Mountain. This beast, capable of dispelling the power of darkness, is supposed to be a blue phoenix composed of ice. Created in the shape of this beast is Numinu, its name means 'holy.' It has been crafted from enchanted ice that never melts. Considered a holy relic among Barbarians, this weapon is bestowed to their mightiest warrior. The wielder of this weapon is the most powerful warrior among Barbarians, and may be considered their king.

ut.story: A worn-out helmet of Frost Giant King. It was last used by the darkness-ridden Frost Giant King. Gau, hoping that the tragedy of Windland Snow Mountain won't repeat itself, keeps this broken helmet to mourn the fallen hero.

ut.story: Trumpet made with the horn of the guardian beast of Windland Snow Mountain, Orox. Orox of the Snowy Mountain grants noble warriors great power and the ability to see the truth. When a warrior who has received the blessing of Orox blows this horn, it will boost the morale of comrades and bring clarity to their minds.

ut.story: Mug of the Barbarian King who first settled down in the snowy mountains. When the first Barbarian King settled down in Windland, he swore to become the guardian of the snowy mountains and shared this mug with the holy beings of the mountains. The protect magic of the frost wolf imbued in the Barbarian Mug increases the ATK of Vortex and the effect of Freeze.

ut.story: A bracelet made with a Snowdrop Flower. Although it was made with clumsy hands, the children at the orphanage made this bracelet as a birthday gift for Gau after seeing him grieve for his fallen Barbarian tribes. A Snowdrop means hope and comfort in the language of flowers.
